xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.5 Hetuduka, Saṃkiliṭṭhattika » 1.5.1 Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikapada » 1.5.1.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Saṃkiliṭṭhattika
Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
192.
353Hetu saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo hetussa saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
193.
354Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
355Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
356Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
357(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetvādiup1.5.2 Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikapada >>
